bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridges [Edition]
IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridges [Edition]
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 802.1Q, 2012 Edition, (Incorporating IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbe-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbc-2011,IEEE Std 802.1Qbb-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qaz-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbf-2011,IEEE Std 802.1Qbg-2012, IEEE Std 802.1aq-2012, IEEE Std 802.1Q-2012

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies how the MAC Service is supported by Virtual Bridged Local AreaNetworks, the principles of operation of those networks, and the operation of VLAN-aware Bridges,including management, protocols, and algorithms.

This standard specifies how the MAC Service is supported by Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks, the principles of operation of those networks, and the operation of VLAN-aware Bridges, including management, protocols, and algorithms. It Incorporates: IEEE Std 802.1Q&#8482;-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbe&#8482;-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbc&#8482;-2011,IEEE Std 802.1Qbb&#8482;-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qaz&#8482;-2011, IEEE Std 802.1Qbf&#8482;-2011,IEEE Std 802.1Qbg&#8482;-2012, IEEE Std 802.1aq&#8482;-2012, and IEEE Std 802.1Q&#8482;-2011/Cor 2-2012)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
